title: Fake News Logo
content:
Would love any + all feedback + critique.  
This is a logo for a political humor site, w/ content roughly similar to The Onion/Daily Show. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030443im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/lockup3_4444.gif)

 [‹ Dairy Farm Logo Critique](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030443/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31210 "Go to previous forum topic") [Womens' Health Clinic ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123030443/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34107 "Go to next forum topic")
author: atw

comments.content: LOL! I’m not sure what can be improved, but I think you could easily join the two words “NEWS” and “GROPER” since they are differentiated by colour anyways.

Because of the two globes the four finger height looks a bit smaller to the “NEWS GROPER” text even though you made it of the same height.

And it looks like you have two logos. Hand and globes. They don’t connect.

I agree with bergh about joining words.

Litera, I might be totally off, but I think the hand is supposed to be groping the “globes.”

I love the name and the serious look of the satirical logo.

<cite>Litera, I might be totally off, but I think the hand is supposed to be groping the “globes.”</cite>

... **supposed to be** grouping. You said it yourself. To my opinion it’s not.

Are the globes supposed to be male “globes” or female “globes”? If the former, maybe place the hand palm-up under the globes. If the latter, try placing it vertically with the palm facing the globes. Either way, the hand should be more curved.

- Lex
